topdown

Class ControlsMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • topdown.ControlsMenu

  • public class ControlsMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to display the controls menu.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Isaac Jimenez, Nicholas English, Suman Gurung

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String a
      Holds the string description for the 'a' button on the keyboard.
      private java.lang.String back
      Holds the on-screen "back" button string.
      private java.lang.String d
      Holds the string description for the 'd' button on the keyboard.
      private java.lang.String escape
      Holds the string description for the "esc" button on the keyboard.
      private Game game
      Holds the current game object.
      private java.lang.String mouse
      Holds the string description for the left mouse button.
      private java.lang.String s
      Holds the string description for the 's' button on the keyboard.
      private java.lang.String spaceBar
      Holds the string description for the space bar on the keyboard.
      private int start
      Holds the integer value of the starting X-coordinate for the text descriptions on the screen.
      private java.lang.String w
      Holds the string description for the 'w' button on the keyboard.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlsMenu(Game game)
      Constructor initializes strings to be used to display controls for the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlsMenu

        public ControlsMenu(Game game)
        Constructor initializes strings to be used to display controls for the game. It also takes in a Game as a parameter and sets it equal to the instance of Game created above.
        Parameters:
        game - represents the instance of Game that is being passed down to this constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Creates the 2D graphics for the controls menu.
        Parameters:
        g - The visual display for the 2D graphics in the controls menu.
